column1: 234612,Respiratory Scientist,,"Test patient heart or lung functioning
column3: Analyse test results to inform diagnosis or treatment
column5: Operate diagnostic or therapeutic medical instruments or equipment
column7: Collaborate with health care professionals to plan or provide treatment
column9: Communicate test or assessment results to medical professionals
column11: Train patients, family members or caregivers in techniques for managing disabilities or illnesses
column13: Inform medical professionals regarding patient conditions and care
column15: Prepare scientific or technical reports or presentations
column17: Examine medical instruments or equipment to ensure proper operation
